block_comment: The given Verilog block handles the assignment operation to facilitate the flow of data from a "grant_pre_r_lcl" signal to a "sending_pre" signal. This operation is implemented via a direct, non-blocking assignment which means that the value of "grant_pre_r_lcl" at the current moment of execution is passed to "sending_pre", allowing for real-time synchronization of values between the two signals.
